about_the_game:
-Prologue-

Due to the Libido Reduction Virus, humanity faced a serious population decline.
The government began developing a vaccine for libido reduction, targeting criminals. However, during clinical trials, a side effect was discovered where if the subject did not continuously release their excessive sexual urges, their DNA would break down, causing severe physical deformations. Despite the failed clinical trials, experiments continued on the test subjects, but one day, the lab was destroyed by an unidentified terrorist group, allowing the imprisoned test subjects to escape.

Yuri Hanasaki looks around in response to the people's screams. Mutant creatures were attacking civilians.
Remembering her father’s teachings to help the weak, she runs out to intervene...

♥Gameplay♥

Fighting Girl Yuri is a side-scrolling action game.
Use various techniques to defeat enemies.

♥Character Development♥

You can strengthen your character by using status points and skill points to grow even stronger.

♥Items and Enhancements♥

When you defeat enemies, you can obtain item boxes with a certain probability.
There’s a low chance to obtain high-grade items.
Enhance items and challenge higher difficulty stages.
The higher the stage difficulty, the higher the chance of obtaining item boxes.

♥In-game HCG♥

If you get caught by an enemy or remain down for too long, the -In-game HCG- will activate.

In this state, HP gradually decreases, and if it reaches 0, an event animation will play.
Increase your resistance stats to escape quickly.

♥CG Mode♥

If you fail a mission, depending on the condition of your clothes, one of three dynamic CG animations—intact, damaged, or fully stripped—will be triggered.
Collected animations can be rewatched in Gallery Mode. You can customize underwear images in the illustration animations.

♥Game Functions (Keyboard)♥

  • Use the arrow keys to move

  • Z key: Attack

  • X key: Skill attack

  • C key: Dash move

  • Spacebar: Special skill attack

  • Number 1: Use HP recovery potion

  • Number 2: Use MP recovery potion

  • P key: Pause

  • S key: Status window

♥Game Functions (Xbox Controller)♥

  • A button: Attack

  • B button: Skill attack

  • X button: Dash move

  • Y button: Special skill attack

  • LT button: Pause

  • RT button: Status window

  • LB button: Use HP recovery potion

  • RB button: Use MP recovery potion

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters are over 19 years old.
Content Warning: Contains violence, rape and interracial sex.

name: FIGHTING GIRL YURI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 3.20GHz or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.20GHz or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fighting Girl Yuri is a side-scrolling action game. All characters are 19 years old or older. Content Warning: Includes violence, rape, and interspecies sex.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
